text: usane kahaah main chaahata hoon ki vivaah doon tumhen apanee in do putriyon mein se ek se, isapar ki meree seva karoge aath varsh, phir yadi tum poora kar do das (varsh) to ye tumhaaree ichchha hai. main nahin chaahata ki tumapar bojh daaloon aur tum mujhe paoge yadi allaah ne chaaha, to sadaachaariyon mein se
